settings.heading: Physical Therapists & Physical Therapy Assistant CE Accreditation
Searching for physical therapy CEU courses? Look no further!

settings.text: We know what you’re thinking when it comes to continuing education…. Boring! But it doesn’t have to be this way. At HomeCEU, our philosophy is to make the CEU process for PTs and PTAs quick, easy, and enjoyable! With over 1,000 hours of PT/PTA-approved courses to choose from, we have more CEU options than ANY other provider.
Physical Therapists and Physical Therapist Assistants (PT, PTA)

Our courses are approved for continuing education requirements for PTs and PTAs in the following states: AR, CA, IL, KY, LA, MD, MN, NJ, NM, NV, NY, OH, OK, PA, TX, WV 

Our courses satisfy the requirements for Continuing Education in the following states: AK, AL, AZ, CO, CT, DC, DE, FL, GA, HI, IA, ID, IN, KS, MA, ME, MI, MO, MS, MT, NC, ND, NE, NH, OR, RI, SC, SD, TN, UT, VA, VT, WA, WI, WY

Colibri Healthcare LLC is a Texas Physical Therapy Association Approved Provider of Continuing Education, and our current provider number is 2411048TX.

  • Click here to verify accreditation status.
  • When registering an approval number or accreditation number with Texas Board of PT Examiners enter the number without any dashes (-) or slashes (/ \).  Please use only letters and numbers.
  • All of our courses listed within the Course Catalog under Texas > PT/PTA are approved via our Approved Provider status. Each course uses the same Approval Number as listed above, with the exception of the Texas Ethics course. The approval number for the Texas Ethics course can be found on your course certificate.
  • Our current Texas Physical Therapy Association Approved/Accredited provider number is 2411048TX (this number is valid for courses taken between June 1st, 2022 and November 30th, 2024).
Colibri Healthcare, LLC is an Approved Continuing Education (CE) Program through the California Physical Therapy Association (Approved CE Program status number CPTAAP-28).
Illinois Department of Financial and Professional Regulation (Physical Therapy CE Sponsor #216.000315).
Colibri Healthcare, LLC is an approved provider of continuing education courses by the APTA Kentucky, a Chapter of the American Physical Therapy Association. (Approval Code CS28-2022-APTAKY).

Colibri Healthcare, LLC is recognized by the New York State Education Department’s State Board for Physical Therapy as an approved sponsor of continuing education for Physical Therapists and Physical Therapy Assistants.
Colibri Healthcare, LLC’s is an approved provider by the Oklahoma State Board of Medical Licensure and Supervision (BAP202310050).

We report to CE Broker for the following states and professions:

  • Alabama OTs/OTAs
  • Arizona OTs/OTAs
  • Florida PTs/PTAs, OTs/OTAs, MTs/LMTs & SLPs
  • Georgia MTs/LMTs & OTs/OTAs
  • Louisiana OTs/OTAs
  • South Carolina MTs/LMTs, OTs/OTAs & PTs/PTAs
  • Tennessee OTs/OTAs & PTs/PTAs

Physical Therapy Continuing Education Requirements

Locate your physical therapy continuing education requirements, to ensure you complete exactly what you need!
